mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs (studentid, title, createtime, detail, good) VALUES (#{studentid}, #{title}, #{createtime}, #{detail}, #{good});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bbs b WHERE (SELECT grade FROM user WHERE username=b.studentid) = #{grade} AND (SELECT classno FROM user WHERE username=b.studentid) = #{classno} AND (SELECT collage FROM user WHERE username=b.studentid) = #{collage} AND (SELECT major FROM user WHERE username=b.studentid) = #{major}
